title: ellArum vAzhaTTumE
sahitya:
ellArum vAzhaTTumE pErinbam eidi


anupallavi

  selva serukkinrip-pullar porAmaiyinri nalla manasuDanE nADOnga nIDuzhi


caraNam    suyanala shUzhcciyum ayalavar ATSiyum sOmbalum inrit-tIya vImbu shaNDaiyum inri
bhayaminri uNmaiyai nayamurap-pEshiyE phalangaLaik-karudAdu nalangaLaiyE purinda
